description:
This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

The original name for this canyon is "Short Canyon".

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

  • YouTube.com : Richard Pattison, Short Canyon (Greenup) movie


Background

From an OzCanyons discussion in 2008, Shane Greenup asked: does anyone here know the history of Greenup canyon?

David Noble replied: I think the original name is "Short Canyon" for that is what it is - fairly short. I remember visiting it from below after my first trip down Midwinter Canyon - back sometime in the early/mid eighties. On that trip - we went up it from below - climbing up ledges and roots and almost reaching the top. Now on that trip were Roger and Nipper who were on the trip that found Midwinter Canyon - and I don't think they had seen it before. So I assume our name "Short Canyon" is the earliest name for the canyon. Anyway - I know a fair number of people that canyon in that area - and that is the name they seem to use for it.
name: Greenup
